show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: War With China
content:
My theme for 2014. I describe the historical underpinnings and the inevitable war as a resentful United States attacks China in a futile attempt to contain it, precisely mirroring Britain’s attack on Germany twice in the twentieth century.
It is not a matter of ‘whether’.
It is a question of ‘when’.
Current policies are and have been based on a total suspension of consequences for making the wrong decisions.
We are about to face those consequences.
They cover the entire spectrum of social demographics: from the government through to the population-at -large: from the richest of the very rich to the poorest beggar on the streets.
The consequences will be felt by all.
